title: (Rescue Process for Small and Micro Companies) Act 2021 (No. 30 of 2021),
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Companies (Rescue Process for Small
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Companies (Rescue Process for Small 

and Micro Companies) Act 2021 (Commencement) Order 2021.
text_norm: 1 order may cited company (rescue process small micro companies) act 2021 (commencement) order 2021

title: (Rescue Process for Small and Micro Companies) Act 2021 (No. 30 of 2021),
heading: 2. The 7th day of December 2021 is appointed as the day on which the
text_raw:
2. The 7th day of December 2021 is appointed as the day on which the 
Companies (Rescue Process for Small and Micro Companies) Act 2021 
(No. 30 of 2021) shall come into operation. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

7 December, 2021. 

LEO VARADKAR, 

Minister for Enterprise, Trade and Employment. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 10th December, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [673] 3
